metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2808 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The watch implementation in the JavaScript engine in Mozilla Firefox before46.0, Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.8, and Firefox ESR 45.x before 45.1 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(generation-count overflow, out-of-bounds HashMap write access, andapplication crash) via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
